GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: IN ORDER TO MAKE CONTRIBUTIONS FOR CHARITABLE, RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL OR SCIENTIFIC PURPOSES.

DissolutionInformationGrp.ShortExplanationTxt: DURING THE TAX YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2021, THE FOUNDATION HAD A SUBSTANTIAL CONTRACTION DUE TO PAYING OUT GRANTS IN EXCESS OF CURRENT YEAR CONTRIBUTIONS. THE FOUNDATION EXPECTS TO RECEIVE CONTRIBUTIONS IN FUTURE YEARS TO MAINTAIN THE FUND BALANCE AND TO CONTINUE TO ALLOW FOR SUCH GRANTS. THERE IS NO PLAN TO DISSOLVE THE FOUNDATION.

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: IN ORDER TO MAKE CONTRIBUTIONS FOR CHARITABLE, RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL OR SCIENTIFIC PURPOSES.
ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.ResultsOfVerificationTxt: KATTEN MUCHIN ROSENMAN FOUNDATION, INC. MADE A GRANT TO NOAH BENJAMIN REISMAN FOUNDATION, WHICH IS A NON-OPERATING PRIVATE FOUNDATION. THE GRANT OF $50,000 IS TO BE USED FOR THE RECIPIENT FOUNDATION'S MISSION. PER VERIFICATION WITH THE FOUNDATION, THE RECIPIENT USED THE DONATION FOR SUCH PURPOSES

GeneralExplanationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990-PF, PART I, LINE 25D - GRANTS TO PRIVATE FOUNDATIONS
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: GRANTS TO NON-CONTROLLED PRIVATE NON-OPERATING FOUNDATIONS:-----------------------------------------------------------------------THE KATTEN MUCHIN ROSENMAN FOUNDATION, INC. MADE CERTAIN CHARITABLE GRANTS TO NON-CONTROLLED PRIVATE NON-OPERATING FOUNDATIONS. THE FOUNDATION HAS MAINTAINED EXPENDITURE RESPONSIBILITY ON THESE GRANTS, BUT IS NOT REQUIRING THE RECIPIENT FOUNDATIONS MAKE A CORPUS ELECTION. AS SUCH, THE FOUNDATION HAS REDUCED FORM 990-PF, PAGE 1, LINE 25D BY THE AMOUNT OF THE CHARITABLE GRANTS FOR WHICH NO CORPUS ELECTION WAS MADE. IN 2021, THE TOTAL ADJUSTMENT TO FORM 990-PF, PAGE 1, LINE 25D IS $82,500.

LiquidationExplanationStmt.ExplanationTxt: DURING THE TAX YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2021, THE FOUNDATION HAD A SUBSTANTIAL CONTRACTION DUE TO A PRIOR PERIOD ADJUSTMENT AND PAYING OUT GRANTS IN EXCESS OF CURRENT YEAR CONTRIBUTIONS. THE FOUNDATION EXPECTS TO RECEIVE CONTRIBUTIONS IN FUTURE YEARS TO MAINTAIN THE FUND BALANCE AND TO CONTINUE TO ALLOW FOR SUCH GRANTS. THERE IS NO PLAN TO DISSOLVE THE FOUNDATION.
